= Petri nets Emulator =

Petri nets Emulator is open sourse project under GNU Public License. It is developed by several students of NTUU "KPI". <br />
This application is used for editing and emulating Petri nets. You can find information about Petri-nets in Wikipedia article about <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Petri_net">Petri-nets</a>.


You can download sourse code of project <a href="http://code.google.com/p/petrinets/">here</a>
